verses.1: Topa ka phat dinga, ka lungsim khempeuh tawh ama min siangtho ka phat ding hi.
verses.2: Topa ka phat dinga, ama migitna ka mangngilh kei ding hi.
verses.3: Amah in ka mawhna khempeuh hong maisak a, ka natna khempeuh hong damsak hi.
verses.4: Han khuk tung ding kimlai hong suaktasak a, itna le hehpihna tampi hong pia hi.
verses.5: Muvanlai bangin ka tha a hat theih nadingin thupha namkim hong pia hi.
verses.6: Topa in a kinengniamte adingin thuman thutangin thu a khen hi.
verses.7: Amah in ama geelna Moses tungah gen a, ama nasepnate Israel mite a musak hi.
verses.8: Topa dikin hehpihna tawh kidim a, heh hakin, a lian mahmah itna kip tawh a kidim hi.
verses.9: Amah in a tawntungin hong taii ngitnget lo dinga, amah heh paisuak lo ding hi.
verses.10: Amah in eiteʼ khialhna tawh a kituakin eite tungah hong bawl lo a, eiteʼ mawhna tawh a kituakin hong thukkik lo hi.
verses.11: Vantung pen leitung panin a san mah bangin amah a zahtakteʼ tungah ama itna kip lianin sang mahmah hi.
verses.12: Nisuahna pen nitumna panin a gamlat mah bangin i mawhna hangin gimnate eiteʼ kiang panin gamlapi ah a nil khia hi.
verses.13: Pa in tate a hehpih bangin Topa in amah a zahtakte hong hehpih hi.
verses.14: Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in eiteʼ pianna hong thei a, eite pen leivui ihihna a phawk hi.
verses.15: Eite ihih leh i nuntakna pen lopa tawh kibang a, lo lai ah a po paakte bangin a palh hi.
verses.16: Bang hang hiam cih leh huih in amah semin bei mang a, tua mun in amah thei nawn lo hi.
verses.17: Ahih hangin Topaʼ itna kip pen amah a zahtak mite tungah a tawntung pan a tawntung dongin kip ngitnget a, ama thumanna pen ama thuciamna zui-in a thupiak bangin sep ding a phawk mite tungah a khangkhangin a kip tawntung hi.
verses.19: Topa in vantungah ama tokhom phut khin a, amah in mun khempeuh a uk hi.
verses.20: Ama thugen a ngai, ama thu bangin a sem no a thahat, no ama vantung mite aw, Topa phat un.
verses.21: Ama deih bangin a gamta ama nasem, ama mihon khempeuhte aw, Topa phat un.
verses.22: Ama ukna sunga a om ama bawl sate aw, Topa phat un. Keʼn, Topa ka phat ding hi.
